document.discussion_title: Mobile speed cameras in use across South Yorkshire
document.topic_text: Mobile speed cameras in use across South Yorkshire Mobile speed cameras are to be in use across South Yorkshire this week. Find out where they will be operating: Sheffield: A6102 Main Road, Wharncliffe Side A6102 Middlewood Road A6135 Station Road/ White Lane A621 Baslow Road Doncaster Free Press , 3 min. ago in Yorkshire & Humber Pokemon Go muggings reported across South Yorkshire 0 Have your say A series of muggings and assaults have taken place across South Yorkshire involving people playing new mobile phone craze Pokemon Go. In just one week, police were called to seven separate incidents involving people playing the game,... Pokemon Go muggings reported across South Yorkshire 0 Have your say A series of muggings and assaults have taken place across South Yorkshire involving people playing new mobile phone craze Pokemon Go. In just one week, police were called to seven separate incidents involving people playing the game,... Arsonists hunted over vehicle fires across South Yorkshire 0 Have your say Investigations are underway into a spate of vehicle fires across South Yorkshire. Firefighters were called out to a blaze in Pastures Lane, Cadeby, Doncaster, at 1.20am today but the vehicle found burning was so well alight it was... Doncaster Free Press , 15 August 2016 in Yorkshire & Humber Speed camera locations in South Yorkshire next week 0 Have your say Here is the latest list of locations for mobile speed cameras across the region, for the week commencing Monday, August 22. Speed camera locations in South Yorkshire for the week commencing Monday August 22: A6023 Mexborough Relief...
